title: Atomix.Virtual.DJ.Professional-v5.2.Inc.Patch-O.S.GR
description:
Take the next step, add images to the sound!
VirtualDJ is the only existing solution today to let you mix and scratch smoothly any kind of music video.

VirtualDJ is compatible with any kind of video file: DVD, DivX, xvid, Mpeg1/2/4, avi, wmv, mov, vob, etc... Its SubFrame engine automatically raises the sampling frequency in order to provide a perfectly smooth scratch even at low speed.

VirtualDJ offers dozen of video transitions and effects specially thought for a DJ use. VirtualDJ video is compatible with the timecoded records, making it the only solution letting you scratch music videos from a turntable. When you play a track without video in it, VirtualDJ can play computer-generated images in rhythm with the music, or display static images of your choice.

With timecode vinyls you can scratch and mix videos just as if they where on vinyls! VirtualDJ used with its timecoded records can scratch videos directly on your traditional turntable. All you have to do is play the special VirtualDJ record, and everything goes as if you had "downloaded" your videos inside this special record.It's simply magic! 
VirtualDJ used with its timecoded records can scratch digital music directly on your traditional turntable. All you have to do is play the special VirtualDJ record, and everything goes as if you had "downloaded" your MP3 inside this special record. It's simply magic!

Timecoded solutions are common nowadays amongst DJ softwares, but VirtualDJ is the only one to offer:

    * An anti-skip engine that automatically correct any jump your needle might do on the groove if you were to scratch too heavily.
    * A fully automated calibration process, thank to its adaptive algorithm.
    * An algorithm very robust against mass-wire problems.
    * A native integration within VirtualDJ's sound engine, allowing access to all VirtualDJ features, whether you use timecoded records or not
    * Possibility to play seamless loops on your turntable
    * Automatic loading at the right pitch
    * Use of Master Tempo pitch
    * Access to an infinite number of CUE points saved per songs
    * Compatibility with music videos (smoothly scratch music videos right on your turntable)

Vinyl solutions
Numark TTX
Numark TTX turntable
Custom skin support
Pioneer CDJ 800

With superstar DJ's such as Carl Cox lending his name to the product and Dennis Ferrer using it live at his gigs, VirtualDJ is well established in the club scene World wide. Being used at all from huge festivals by Coldcut to your local club dj's, VirtualDJ is present at a wide range of venues and used by thousands of DJ's around the world.

Get ready to enter the era of digital djing!
VirtualDJ has been designed to perfectly fit inside your existing DJ booth, and help you progressively switch to digital mixing, at your own pace. You will soon discover the numerous advantages of digital mixing:

    * With digital files, no more broken, stolen or lost CDs.
    * The database lets you access instantly thousands of titles.
    * With an Internet connection you can play directly from the millions of Napster tracks, all legally.
    * The provided softwares RipVinyl and RipDVD will help you digitalize your whole music collection in no time.
    * If you're equipped with video screens, take the next step and play and mix music videos.
    * VirtualDJ can interface with its own control devices (DAC3, DJConsole, XP10), or use your turntables/CD players, through a special record/CD.



VirtualDJ works with a wide range of midi controllers and midi mixers and with timecode vinyl or CD's you can even use your excisting DJ hardware to control VirtualDJ.

VirtualDJ offers a wide range of features that makes your mixing more creative and offers features that will improve your skills, and take your DJ-ing to a whole new level:

    * Enhanced loop engine with seamless automatic loops you can place and play with the loops on the fly without any possible mistake.
    * The Auto BPM counter that can automatically set your titles to the right pitch, allowing lightning-fast mixes.
    * With VirtualDJ's synchronized sampler you can metamorphose your mixes and give them a quality worth the best remixers.
    * Wave display of the rhythmic structure of your songs that lets you plan your mixes better.
    * The hundreds of available effects will spice up your mixes, especially new-generation effects like BeatGrid.
    * Large number of control devices (timecoded records, xp10, dac3, djconsole, etc) allow for a professional control.
